item.title: HTML5 Accessibility
PowerShell Projects
item.description: Prose Grinder Pandoc Templates Contributor of PowerShell port. Premade scripts to format text for traditional (book) publishing, using Pandoc’s templating features. Formatted nonfiction and fiction manuscripts looks suspiciously similar to Markdown. Hence, in order to make the process less tedious for authors, we recommend writing in Markdown in the first place. Many authors use Windows, so a Windows-compatible port of the Prose Grinder utilties are needed.

item.title: Python Projects
item.description: Confluence Stale Reminder (WIP) This is a utility for finding stale pages (pages which are over 6 months old) and emailing people to update them. Source Future: Archiving capabilities. MkDocs Material Codelab Theme A derivation of Hugo Codelab Themes (clones of Google Codelabs), which can integrate and look consistent with MkDocs Material Theme. Demo Source

item.title: Resume
item.description: Download PDF GEP Worldwide Technical Writer Intern March 2021 - Present Marketing Outreach Scripts Write bite-sized explanations of GEP Software’s current engineering projects. Showcase the department’s cutting edge practices and innovations. Limitations: video length of around 1 minute - 70 seconds per topic. Administrative Duties Patent drafter Create fowcharts and diagrams for software architecture. The inventor should provide math equations in LaTeX notation. Alternatively, they can send over a Markdown document with Tex equations.

item.title: Enable Port Forwarding for IPFS on a Fios router
item.description: .note img{border:1px solid black;} If you use an IPv4 address and want to share files using the InterPlanetary File System protocol on your home network, the recommended way is to set port forwarding. Port forwarding on the router is manufacturer-specific, so this quick guide shows how to do it with Verizon Fios. Typically most routers use https://192.168.1.1/ as their admin access IP address. Open a browser and go to the address https://192.

item.title: Zdog Scope
item.description: Create Zdog graphics with a 3D editor. Figure 1: A sphere that shows the major axis. Demo of Editor Press the “Demo” button on the top to load a sample model. GitHub Page Features Import/Export JSON Tree view w/ draggable sort Assign name and edit properties (double click) Controls Zoom: Mousewheel Panning: Shift + drag or MMB + drag Rotate: Click + drag Undo: Ctrl + Z Redo: Ctrl + Y or Ctrl + Shift + Z Generate code embed In the left panel, click on “Embed Dream” under the tree view Copy HTML output and paste into a document.

item.title: JavaScript Projects
item.description: Click and drag to rotate. .zdog-canvas { background: transparent; cursor: move; } Pose Stand Flat In Flight Curl Toes Wings Fold Wings Mouth Chew Nod Loops Blink Loop Idle Loop Reset Polly.animation.face.blinkLoop(); Polly.animation.idle.default(); Polly.animation.transition.standFlat(); Another abandoned personal project.

item.title: Wordless Instructions
item.description: Create an instruction set for a hypothetical machine that can make plants grow. Cannot use words. Direct link to PDF. Drawn with Adobe Illustrator.
